overview: Mr. Kassouf is an innovator that utilizes forward thinking to creatively exploit market opportunities through his technological prowess. Previous to e3d labs Inc., Kassouf co-Founded eDef Media Labs, a research company that specializes in transforming video and film pictures from standard definition to high definition in order to meet broadcast specs. Kassouf is considered to be an expert in Entertainment Technology and is still sought after by reputable post-production houses for consulting.
